$$\mathrm{RMSE} = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}{(y_i-\hat{y}_i)^2}}$$

$$\mathrm{Sales} = \beta_0 + \beta_1 \times \mathrm{Competition} + \beta_2 \times \mathrm{Advertisement} + \epsilon$$

$$
\begin{align}
y_i&: \text{ actual outcome for obs. }i\\
\hat{y}_i&: \text{ predicted outcome for obs. }i\\
N&: \text{ Number of observations}\\
\end{align}
$$

$$\mathrm{Height} \approx \beta_0 + \beta_1 \times \mathrm{Weight}$$

$$\mathrm{SS}_{\mathrm{res}} = \sum_{i = 1}^{N} \left(y_i-\hat{y}_i\right)^2$$

$$\mathrm{SS}_{\mathrm{tot}} = \sum_{i = 1}^{N} \left(y_i-\bar{y}\right)^2$$

$$\mathrm{res}_i = y_i - \left(\beta_0 + \beta_1x_i\right)$$

$$\mathrm{SS}_{\mathrm{res}} = \sum_{i = 1}^{N} \mathrm{res}_i^2$$
